alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Beaver and north central Iron Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 514 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 32 miles east of Ranch Campground, or 34 miles east of Ursine, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lund. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
